mapper.select: SELECT s.shop_id, s.shop_name, s.shop_desc, s.phone, s.shop_img, s.longitude, s.latitude, s.priority, s.create_time, s.last_edit_time, s.enable_status, s.advice, p.employee_id, p.name FROM tb_shop s LEFT JOIN tb_shop_auth_map p ON s.shop_id = p.shop_id WHERE p.employee_id = #{employeeId}

SELECT shop_id, owner_id, area_id, shop_category_id, parent_category_id, shop_name, shop_desc, shop_addr, phone, shop_img, longitude, latitude, priority, create_time, last_edit_time, enable_status, advice FROM tb_shop WHERE shop_id = #{shopId}
